snippet: Cardinal Sean Brady apologized to victims of sexual abuse but refused to resign after reports he had failed to warn parents their children were being sexually abused by a priest in 1975.
abstract: Cardinal Sean Brady, leader of the Irish Catholic Church, apologizes to victims of sexual abuse but rejects calls to resign after a TV documentary reported that he had failed to warn parents their children were being sexually abused by a priest in 1975.
lead_paragraph: Cardinal Sean Brady apologized to victims of sexual abuse but refused to resign after reports he had failed to warn parents their children were being sexually abused by a priest in 1975.

headline.main: Ireland: Catholic Church Leader Apologizes, but Will Not Resign
headline.print_headline: Ireland: Catholic Church Leader Apologizes, but Will Not Resign
